member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_FORMAT_CAPS
member.summary: Defines capabilities related to input formats for a Microsoft Direct3D 11 video processor.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_FORMAT_CAPS.D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_FORMAT_CAPS_RGB_INTERLACED
member.summary: The video processor can deinterlace an input stream that contains interlaced RGB video.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_FORMAT_CAPS.D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_FORMAT_CAPS_RGB_PROCAMP
member.summary: The video processor can perform color adjustment on RGB video.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_FORMAT_CAPS.D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_FORMAT_CAPS_RGB_LUMA_KEY
member.summary: The video processor can perform luma keying on RGB video.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_FORMAT_CAPS.D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_FORMAT_CAPS_PALETTE_INTERLACED
member.summary: The video processor can deinterlace input streams with palettized color formats.
